SEARCH
Package Characters

Class EnemyRock

java.lang.Object
Characters.Character
Characters.EnemyRock
public class EnemyRock extends Character
Description:

Represents a rock-type enemy character in the game. This enemy moves randomly or intelligently based on the player's proximity. It interacts with the environment and player, and can be defeated by bomb explosions.

Author:
mguzelocak, Zelele

    • EnemyRock

      public EnemyRock(Background bg, JackBomber jack)
      Constructs a new EnemyRock with the specified background and player reference.
      Parameters:
      bg - the game background
      jack - the JackBomber player character

  • Method Details

    • setDefaultValues

      public void setDefaultValues()
      Initializes default position, speed, and direction values for the enemy.

    • getPlayerImage

      public void getPlayerImage()
      Loads enemy sprite images for different directions from the resources.

    • moveSmart

      public void moveSmart()

    • moveRandomly

      public void moveRandomly()
      Moves the enemy in the current direction if there is no collision. If a collision occurs, picks a new random direction.

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the animation frame counter for sprite switching.

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics g)
      Draws the enemy sprite to the screen based on direction and animation frame.
      Parameters:
      g - the Graphics object used to draw the enemy

    • handleExplosion

      public void handleExplosion(Rectangle explosionArea)
      Checks if the enemy is within an explosion area and sets it as defeated if so.
      Parameters:
      explosionArea - the rectangular area affected by the bomb explosion
